recommendations: URGENT: Address all critical security vulnerabilities immediately
Implement input validation and output encoding for all user data
Add CSRF protection to all state-changing operations
Implement proper authentication and authorization checks
Review error handling to prevent information disclosure
Improve logging practices to avoid sensitive data exposure
Add security headers for clickjacking protection
Conduct regular security reviews and penetration testing
Provide security training for development team
Integrate security scanning into CI/CD pipeline
